channel.title: Huge Pest control problem! Need help asap!
channel.description:
Everytime we get near a portal in pest control, in the client cmd box this comes up and it freezes your client, can anybody help me with a fix?
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3888 at EntityDef.method161(EntityDef.java:62) at client.drawMinimap(client.java:9849) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8334) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9118) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)

item.title: Huge Pest control problem! Need help asap!
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

well you added something in the client.java and it is out of bounds, that it integer is to large for client/server to read.

Read full topic
item.source: Huge Pest control problem! Need help asap!
